room_title: Escape room "Poltergeist" by Escape at the Shore in Atlantic City
room_description: You and your team of paranormal investigators have been hired to investigate numerous reports of ghost sightings and poltergeist activity coming from the old Volkov Manor. This site has been investigated before in the late 1960â€™s by top Paranormal Investigators of the time. All who have failed to silence the activity. Your mission is to uncover what really happened at the Volkov Manor and attempt to restore peace to the property for future residents.
